INSERT INTO financeHub.news (data_hash, title, link, published_at) VALUES
(#{item.dataHash}, #{item.title}, #{item.link}, #{item.publishedAt}::date)
ON CONFLICT (data_hash) DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO financeHub.ipo (data_hash, company_name, link, period, fixed_offering_price, expected_offering_price, subscription_rate, under_writer) VALUES
(#{item.dataHash}, #{item.companyName}, #{item.link}, #{item.period}, #{item.fixedOfferingPrice}, #{item.expectedOfferingPrice}, #{item.subscriptionRate}, #{item.underWriter})
ON CONFLICT (data_hash) DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO financeHub.scheduler_execution_log (job_name, execution_time, status, records_processed, records_inserted, records_skipped, error_message, execution_duration_ms) VALUES (#{jobName}, #{executionTime}, #{status}, #{recordsProcessed}, #{recordsInserted}, #{recordsSkipped}, #{errorMessage}, #{executionDurationMs})
